about.details:
Incorporated in the year 2005, Mittal Life Style Ltd is a Mumbai based company dealing in Denim & Bottom weight Fabrics. The company is a prominent supplier of Fashion Fabrics, Cotton Canvas denims, Dupion bottom Fabrics, Polyester Fabrics, Cotton Fabric, knit fabrics etc. to the textile industry.

The company has tied-up with about 16 Composite mills to get denim fabric manufactures as per its need and requirements. Some of the company's regular suppliers are Mafatlal Industries Limited, Oswal Industries Limited, Bhaskar Industries Private Limited, Nandan Denim Limited etc. The Company has also tie-up with 11 logistic companies to pick denim fabric from various mills and warehouse at their premises.

Some of the competitive strengths of the company are-

1. Existing relationship with suppliers
2. Customer Centric Business Model
3. Promoters and Experienced Management

As on October 30, 2017 Mittal Life Style had 12 Permanent employees.

faqs.question: What is the Mittal Life Style Ltd IPO?
faqs.answer:
Mittal Life Style Ltd IPO is a SME IPO of 2100000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹4.41 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹21 per share. The minimum order quantity is 6000.

The IPO opens on March 19, 2018, and closes on March 21, 2018.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Mittal Life Style Ltd IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Mittal Life Style Ltd IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Mittal Life Style Ltd IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Mittal Life Style Ltd IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Mittal Life Style Ltd IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Mittal Life Style Ltd IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Mittal Life Style Ltd IPO opens on March 19, 2018 and closes on March 21, 2018.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Mittal Life Style Ltd IPO?
faqs.answer: Mittal Life Style Ltd IPO lot size is 6000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,26,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Mittal Life Style Ltd IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Mittal Life Style Ltd IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
